pages.text: Hum ney ussay zamin mein qooat ata farmaee thi aur ussay her cheez kay saman bhi inayat ker diye thay
Woh aik raah kay peechay laga

Yahan tak kay sooraj doobney ki jagah phonch gaya aur ussay aik daldal kay chashmay mein ghuroob hota hua paya aur iss chashmay kay pass aik qom ko bhi paya hum ney farma diya kay aey zulqarnain! Ya to tu enhen takleef phonchaye ya inn kay baray mein tu koi behtareen ravish ikhtiyar keray
Uss ney kaha jo zulm keray ga ussay to hum bhi abb saza den gay phir woh apney perwerdigar ki taraf lotaya jayega aur woh ussay sakht tar azab dey ga
Haan jo eman laye aur nek aemaal keray uss kay liye to badlay mein bhalaee hai aur hum ussay apney kaam mein bhi aasani hi ka hukum den gay
Phir woh aur raah kay peechay laga
Yahan tak kay jab sooraj nikalney ki jagah tak phoncha to ussay aik aisi qom per nikalta hua paya kay unn kay liye hum ney uss say aur koi oat nahi banaee
Waqiya aisa hi hai aur hum ney uss kay pass ki kul khabron ka ehaata ker rakha hai
Woh phir aik safar kay saman mein laga
Yahan tak kay jab do deewaron kay darmiyan phoncha unn dono kay paray uss ney aik aisi qom paee jo baat samjhney ka qareeb bhi na thi

Unhon ney kaha aey zulqarnain! Yajoob majooj iss mulk mein (baray bhari) fasadi hain to kiya hum aap kay liye kuch kharch ka intizam ker den? (iss shart per kay) aap humaray aur unn kay darmiyan aik deewat bana den
Uss ney jawab diya kay meray ikhtiyar mein meray perwerdigar ney jo dey rakha hai wohi behtar hai tum sirf qooat taqat say meri madad kero

Mein tum mein aur inn mein mazboot hijab bana deta hun. Mujhay lohay ki chadaren laa do. Yahan tak kay jab inn dono paharon kay darmiyan deewar barabar kerdi to hukum diya kay aag tez jalao ta-waqt-e-kay lohay ki inn chadaron ko bilkul aag ker diyato farmaya meray pass laao iss per pighla hua tanbaa daal doon
Pus to inn mein iss deewar kay upper charhney ki taqat thi aur na iss mein koi soorakh ker saktay thay
